::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman:::p_load(haven, SmartEDA, tidyverse, ggdist,
                tidymodels, ggridges, colorspace, ggthemes)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
exam_data <- read_csv("data/Exam_data.csv")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(exam_data,
       aes(x = ENGLISH,
           y = CLASS)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(title = "Boxplot showing distribution")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex04_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(exam_data,
       aes(x = ENGLISH,
           y = CLASS)) +
  #create ridgeline
  geom_density_ridges( 
    scale = 3,
    rel_min_height = 0.01,
    bandwidth = 2.5,
    fill = lighten("pink", .3),
    color = "white"
  ) +
  #extension of ggplot
  scale_x_continuous(
    name = "English grades",
    expand = c(0,0),
  ) +
  scale_y_discrete(name = "Class", expand = expansion(add=c(0.2, 2.6))) +
  theme_ridges()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex04_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(exam_data,
       aes(x = ENGLISH, 
           y = CLASS, 
           fill = factor(stat(quantile))
           )) +
  stat_density_ridges(
    geom = "density_ridges_gradient",
    calc_ecdf = TRUE, 
    quantiles = 4,
    quantile_lines = TRUE) +
  scale_fill_viridis_d(name = "Quartiles") +
  theme_ridges()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex04_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
